display.title: Craft/Use Raijin
display.description:
Put an Eye of Ender and a NameTag in a crafting grid to create Chakra, throw your trident on the ground and right click it with the Chakra. 

The trident will be endowed with Raijin. You will also recieve a Raijin and a Level 1 Item. 
Right click the Raijin Item to teleport to your trident.  
Right click Level 1 to call your trident back.

Put an Ender Pearl and Nametag in a crafting grid to get a spare Raijin and Level 1.
